title: Butternut Squash and Apple Cider Soup

Ingredients.3: 1  butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into large chunks

Ingredients.13: 0.5 cup sour cream, or as needed

Ingredients.14: 1 pinch ground nutmeg, or to taste

Directions.1: Heat butter in a large pot over medium heat; cook and stir onion in the melted butter until translucent, 5 to 10 minutes. Add butternut squash, potatoes, apple, carrot, and celery to onion; pour in chicken broth and enough apple cider to cover vegetables. Bring mixture to a boil and cover pot. Reduce heat and simmer, adding more apple cider as needed, until vegetables are tender, 35 to 40 minutes.

Directions.2: Blend vegetable mixture with an immersion blender until smooth; stir in cream, cinnamon, and cloves. Simmer until heated through, 5 to 10 minutes. Spoon soup into serving bowls; top each with about 1 tablespoon sour cream and a pinch of nutmeg.
